monitor: 3.0″ Inch, approx. 460k-dot, TFT LCD with anti-reflection coating and 5-level brightness adjustment
isosensitivity: ISO 80-1600 ISO 3200 (available when using Auto mode)
power: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL19 (included) AC Adapter EH-70P (available separately)
sensor: 1/2.3-in. type CMOS; approx. 16.79 million total pixels
